name: Facebook - privacy reminder
description:
The style creates an eye-catching red ring around the globe icon which indicates that a post is "public", to prevent that you overlook you share content with the whole word.
Useful especially if you change the setting often, and if you comment a lot.
additional_info:
For now, the style works only if you're using FB in 
English, French, Spanish, Portuguese or German.
Support for other language settings (hopefully) comming soon.
